document.full_text: clothing maker and retailer gap inc  slashed its full-year profit outlook on thursday, saying that its price increases will not be enough to keep up with rising cotton and production costs.
document.title: gap slashes outlook, cites tougher cost inflation
lines_and_colors: clothing maker and retailer gap inc  slashed its full-year profit outlook on thursday, saying that its price increases will not be enough to keep up with rising cotton and production costs.
